arcade.env.lat

Interface Lattice

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EnvLattice, RectEnvLat, TriEnvLat

    public interface Lattice
    A Lattice represents the environment for molecules.

    Each Lattice is a 3D array of doubles, where the values can represent molecular concentrations or other continuous quantities. Lattice objects are associated with Component objects that control changes in the values in the array (such as diffusion).

    Since:
    2.2
    Version:
    2.3.3

      • copyArray

        static void copyArray(double[][][] fromArray,
                      double[][][] toArray)
        Copies the contents on one 3D array to another 3D array. The clone method only works at the one-dimensional level. Otherwise, we would have shallow cloning.
        Parameters:
        fromArray - the array to copy from
        toArray - the array to copy to
